name: Following
summary: A young writer who follows strangers around London becomes entangled in the criminal world after meeting a mysterious thief. Nolan’s debut — shot on a shoestring budget in black and white.

name: Memento
summary: A man with short-term memory loss uses tattoos and photos to hunt his wife’s killer, told in reverse order.

name: Insomnia
summary: A detective with a guilty conscience investigates a murder in an Alaskan town where the sun never sets.

name: Batman Begins
summary: Bruce Wayne trains with the League of Shadows and becomes Batman to defend Gotham from corruption.

name: The Prestige
summary: Two rival magicians obsessively compete to create the ultimate illusion, leading to deception and tragedy.

name: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman faces the Joker, who plunges Gotham into chaos and tests the limits of justice and morality.

name: Inception
summary: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets must plant an idea deep within a target’s mind.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
summary: A reclusive Bruce Wayne returns as Batman to face the powerful revolutionary Bane and save Gotham.

name: Interstellar
summary: A former pilot leads a mission through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

name: Dunkirk
summary: Soldiers are evacuated from Dunkirk during WWII, told through intersecting timelines on land, sea, and air.

name: Tenet
summary: A secret agent manipulates time using “inversion” to stop a threat that could destroy the world.

name: Oppenheimer
summary: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, who leads the creation of the atomic bomb and faces its moral aftermath.
